title: Picking the right champion in ranked?
body:
I'm fine with many champions in League of legends when i play ranked, but i don't know what champion I should pick to do well in team fights. 
For example, if my team has a Caitlyn, Lee sin, Sona and Nasus, how do i decide which champion to pick to give the team a better advantage in teamfights?
I usually go champions that i main - Fizz, Ahri etc but sometimes our team does not have enough CC  so i panic and try to find a midlaner with CC.

Help me please c:

replies.body: Don't try and find a champ, just because you have no CC on the team. If you've rarely played that champ before, you'll probably do worse than you would've if you were playing a champ that you main. Stick with champs you're better with, and have a good grip on. You'll win a lot more.

You should look this up but I think you need to make sure your team has a few things things. Damage, poke, wave clear (can be same as pome), initiation or peel in siege comp, cc and a tank at least one. If no tank and you have a mid pick I recommend someone that can make a tank like lulu. Hope I helped

Go a champ that you play alot, that way you don't receive any toxicness from other players.
ALSO
Try your best!
Oh and if you can, choose a champion that you play alot and you know that you can counter their mid / top / bot lane with :D
